summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Traffic Code (Ordinance 108200), adding Sections 11.20.040 "Special Endorsement for Motorcycle Operator's License," 11.22.200 "Special License Plates - Hulk Hauler," and 11.22.220 "Display of Special License Plates - Hulk Hauler, and 11.22.240 "Dealer and Manufacturer License Plates - Use".
